pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Adaptive Spline Surfaces // Bayesian fitting and sensitivity analysis methods for adaptive spline surfaces described in doi:10.18637/jss.v094.i08. Built to handle continuous and categorical inputs as well as functional or scalar output. An extension of the methodology in Denison, Mallick and Smith (1998) doi:10.1023/A:1008824606259.
